title: Furnished 1 BR with cleaning service  - corporate, temporary
app_fee: $30 application fee, taken off first month rent
posting_body: **availability changes over time**
**** Include your desired start and end date in any inquiries****
(CURRENTLY OPEN STARTING 8/15)
Spacious 1 bedroom second-story apartment in Midtown near Rhodes College, Overton Park, etc .
Price includes weekly cleanings and linen changes.
Utilities and internet included.
About the apartment:
This recently-renovated one-bedroom second-floor apartment is spacious with good light.
I've found it to be an excellent place to unwind, regroup, or work.
You'll be an 8-12 minute drive from downtown.
The location is even closer to Overton Park, The Memphis Zoo, Rhodes College, and Crosstown Concourse, which are mostly walkable, depending on your comfort level.
The Space:
This is the second story in my 1925 home which I spent 18 months personally renovating.
The addition where you'll be staying was originally done sometime in the 50s or 60s.
During the renovation, I kept the vintage charm while completely re-insulating, repainting, reflooring, and adding a new high-efficiency HVAC system for total comfort year-round.
I couldn't be happier with the space and I hope you are, too.
Off-street parking is provided for 1 vehicle directly in front of the home.
Spare room with futon is available for temporary guests at an extra charge--we will discuss how many and how often in advance.
Neighborhood:
This is an historic residential neighborhood in Midtown Memphis with charming tudor revival and craftsman homes from the 20s and 30s.
Café Eclectic, Dino's Italian restaurant, and a mini mart are all about a 7-8 minute walk, or 1 minute drive.
Background and employment check, lease, and deposit required.
For stays less than 30 days, I will ask you to go through Airbnb, where we can work out a similar rate.
